Text:
Thanks for the upload, everything is working great!

I was even able to get it to update to the latest version, 10.1.6, via it's automatic internal updater! (As if Mar/11/13) I let the update install, then sand-boxed the entire app out of Internet access.. just in case.

Thanks again for upping this hard to find but very awesome and useful app.
yeah, cheers... works perfectly as far as i can tell.  Stone was right about it being able to be updated.  i updated it before i applied the reg key, then made sure auto updates were turned off.
